mentions.context: The code, landmark and semilandmark coordinates are available at GitHub: https://github.com/fberio/scanicula-teeth.
The 3D surfaces are available at MorphoMuseum: Berio F., Bayle Y., Agret S., Baum D., Goudemand N., Debiais-Thibaud M., 2022.
The geometric morphometric analyses were performed using the geomorph package (v3.1.1)
The code, landmark and semilandmark coordinates are available at GitHub: https://github.com/fberio/scanicula-teeth.

and supervised classification was computed using the MASS package (v7.3.53) for LDA and the randomForest package (v4.6.14) for Random Forests with R software (v4.0.3) (Liaw & Wiener, 2002;Venables & Ripley, 2002;Adams, Collyer & Kaliontzopoulou, 2019;R Core Team, 2020).

3D surfaces of right palatoquadrate (upper) and Meckelian (lower) teeth were generated with the Amira software (v6.5), extracted using the ContourTreeSegmentation module from the AmiraZIBEdition software (v2018.28)
